title: Теперь я босс!
overview: "Friday!" invited big bosses to go for a unique experiment! In the Now I'm the Boss program, super successful entrepreneurs will go back to where they started for just three days and help startups set up their businesses. While still "green" managers will sit in the chairs of the heads of huge corporations!The project "Now I'm the Boss" will show whether the owners of business empires can remember the past and help newcomers to put their business on track and whether startups will be able to cope with the management of large companies on the fly.
